name: Superman
description: Superman is a well known super hero who can fly. Many movies have been done on him. He met Batman several times.

name: Batman
description: Batman does not have real super powers, but he has money and can build funny cars. He hates the Joker

name: Accessories
description: Batman has a lot of accessories, such as the BatMobile and the BatCave.

name: Spiderman
description: Spiderman goes out every nights to arrest bad guys. He is friend with IronMan

name: Jumping
description: It is almost like flying, but Spiderman needs to launch a spider web.

name: Iron Man
description: Iron Man is like Batman: he has no real super powers, but got a lot of money

name: Accessories
description: Iron man has a nice armour which let him fly.

name: Flying
description: Thanks to his armour, Iron Man can fly
